title: Bug 5340: Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When attempting to add an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog immediately closes. However, the exception list still appears despite the cancellation request. The cancel button should either disable when cancelled or honour the cancellation request by not showing the exception list.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the breakpoint dialog. 
2. Click on the 'Add' button. 
3. In the progress dialog that appears, click on the 'Cancel' button. 
4. Observe that the progress dialog closes, but the exception list still appears.
